text: MOSCOW Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said on Monday that it was extremely important for ethnic Armenian and Azeri forces to respect a ceasefire in Nagorno-Karabakh that was brokered by Russia at the weekend.Since coming into force on Saturday, the truce has frayed, with both sides accusing each other of grave violations and attacks against civilians.Peskov said the Kremlin was monitoring events on the ground closely.
